comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content:
I learned to sail here under the Community Boating program.  Cost me a $1 for the summer, too.

I sailed there in summers of 1981-1984. :)

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi, Brenda! Glad to see you taking an interest in these great images of Boston! You might find it interesting that the photographer, Ernst Halberstadt, was a muralist for the WPA. His work can be seen in numerous post office buildings throughout New England.

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
